summary: An ordinance amending subdivision 13 of Section 1 of Ordinance No. 36032, relating to the location of undertaking establishments, morgues, public, community or association mausoleums, and crematories for the disposition of the bodies of the dead within certain districts and localities within the City of Seattle, and prohibiting the construction and maintenance of such institutions outside of such districts, providing penalties for violation and repealing all ordinances in conflict", approved the 20th day of May 1916.
